qas.question: What German doctor was sued by Schwarzenegger?
How much did the court award Schwarzenegger in the case against Heepe?
Which U.S. tabloid settled out of court with Schwarzenegger in 1999?

context: In 1999, Schwarzenegger sued <a0_0>Dr. Willi Heepe<a0_0/>, a German doctor who publicly predicted his early death on the basis of a link between his steroid use and his later heart problems. As the doctor had never examined him personally, Schwarzenegger collected a US<a1_0>$10,000<a1_0/> libel judgment against him in a German court. In 1999, Schwarzenegger also sued and settled with <a2_0>The Globe<a2_0/>, a U.S. tabloid which had made similar predictions about the bodybuilder's future health.
